name: UIScrollView.ContentInsetAdjustmentBehavior
desc: Constants indicating how safe area insets are added to the adjusted content inset.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: Automatically adjust the scroll view insets.

items.name: case scrollableAxes
items.desc: Adjust the insets only in the scrollable directions.

items.name: case never
items.desc: Do not adjust the scroll view insets.

items.name: case always
items.desc: Always include the safe area insets in the content adjustment.
